title: PROBLEM!!!!!!!!!!!!
body: i have a major problem it's that my league won't load it says window is looking for a solution and i know it's not my computer.

replies.body:
I should be able to help out, but first I need a bit more information.  Can you let me know what your exact error message is (possibly a screenshot)?  Where do you get this problem exactly?  The Patcher, the Loading Screen, etc?

Reply back and let me know!
I already figured it out sorry for asking
